name: Bokor, Appellant, v. The Monongahela Connecting Railroad Co. et al.

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Beien and Robeets, JJ.

parties: Bokor, Appellant, v. The Monongahela Connecting Railroad Co. et al.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Cubiam,
Judgment affirmed.
Mr. Justice Pomeroy took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.

casebody.head_matter:
Bokor, Appellant, v. The Monongahela Connecting Railroad Co. et al.
Argued October 2, 1969.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Beien and Robeets, JJ.
Albert D. Brandon, with him Frank J. Kernqn, for appellant.
V. G. Short, with him Kirkpatrick, Lockhart, Johnson & Hutchinson, for appellee.
January 9, 1970:
